title: Bugsplat telling me to update my driver www.intel.com
body: I keep getting bug splats whenever I try to play those weekly game modes apart from the 6vs6 twisted tree line but even that one is starting to disconnect too, only rank and the two regular map modes work for me. I keep getting bugsplat telling me to upgrade and download something (intel(R) update utility) from the site mentioned in the title line, and after 7-9 bug splats I finally tried it. www.intel.com It worked wonderfully and I had less lag than usual for a day but I still couldn't connect to those weekly game modes and the thumbnail pictures for siege mode items aren't showing. Then my ms started spiking from a regular 50ms-70ms to 95ms-2000ms the next day :/? I just want to know whether any body else has  had this problem? I haven't seen spikes that pointy for 3-5 months or that 2012 server attack on na.
